results.name: a(n) = A249151(n) - n.
comment: It seems that A006093 gives the positions of zeros.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..4096
xref: A249433 and A249434 give the positions of negative and nonnegative values, respectively.
A249430 gives the position where +n appears for the first time, A249432 the positions of records of positive values.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 02 2014
